name: Pinball Up
description:
Pinball Up is a kind of pinball game that anybody can enjoy! You have to hit bumpers, bricks, gems and some other targets with the ball. Explore the unique play style and different fun bonuses.

Features
- Easy controls
- Cool sound effects
- Realistic physics
- Multiple bonuses

How to play
- Press and hold the spring in the ball launcher, and then release to launch the ball.
- Touch on the left side of the screen to control the left flipper or on the right side to control the right flipper.

Play Pinball Up and have fun with this unique pinball action!
